SenStore build tools

0.1.0

Introduction

This is the documentation for the open-source SenStore build tools. These tools can be used to parse a database definition in Python and build a corresponding variable tree.

Getting started

  • The main package is buildtools::dbdef, which documents the parser as well as the database definition language.
  • The main parser function is buildtools::dbdef::read(), which can be used to read a database definition file, and create a Python variable tree.
  • The SenStore database definition can be found in SenStore.dbd
  • The SenStore database definition documentation can be found in SenStore.html
  • The SenStore database interface can be found in SenStore.ice in the client and server distribution. Note that interface documentation can be generated using the ZeroC Ice tool slice2html.
